member.summary: Contains a list of units controller objects that each contain a single unit with the name to be used for its corresponding type. This is typically filled from the [Program Control] table exported by a CSi program.

member.summary: Tests the 'SwapNumeratorsDenominators' cUnits method. Note that this does not affect the assignments in the controls. Effects are only shown in the previews!

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.btnConvert_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Tests the 'Convert' cUnits method. Only works if a units object has been saved, which then appears in the 'Saved Preview' group box.

member.summary: Updates the units object and properly resets controls to display the new object state.

member.summary: Updates the value displayed in the units label preview on the form.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.UpdateComboBoxLists(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the list of available schema items for selection in a given combo box within a given set of combo boxes. This is dependent on current selections within the set.
member.param: If true, then the new lists to be generated based on state are for the numerator controls. Else, it is for the denominator controls.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.ClearComboBoxSelections
member.summary: Clears the combo box selections of all schema combo boxes to ensure a fresh starting state. Note that this also clears the units object.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.cmbBoxSchemaSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox@,System.Windows.Controls.TextBox@,System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Operations to be done whenever a combo box for selection is changed for unit schema items.
member.param: The combo box containing the unit schema selection.
The power text box corresponding to the schema combo box.
The combo box containing the unit value corresponding to the schema combo box.
The index of the unit corresponding to the value selection.
If true, the index is for the unit object in the numerator position.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.GetDefaultName(MPT.Units.Core.cUnit)
member.summary: Return default unit name corresponding to the unit type of the unit provided.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.txtBxPowerTextChanged(System.Windows.Controls.TextBox@,System.Windows.Controls.Label@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Operations to be done whenever the text is changed in a 'power' text box control within the schema controls.
member.param: The power text box that has been changed.
Label control displaying the power in the values controls, which corresponds with the text box control.
The index of the unit corresponding to the power change.
>If true, the index is for the unit object in the numerator position.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.ValidatePowerText(System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the string is only positive numeric, possibly with one a divisor.
member.param: Text to check and modify. Invalid characters are removed.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.cmbBoxValueSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Operations to be done whenever a combo box for selection is changed for unit values.
member.param: The combo box containing the unit value selection.
The index of the unit corresponding to the value selection.
If true, the index is for the unit object in the numerator position.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.SetShorthandUnitsAvailable
member.summary: Determines if there are shorthand units available to be selected and performs relevant form actions.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.LoadSchemaAndValues
member.summary: Updates the controls for setting and displaying the schema and values of the units.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.LoadSchemaAndValues(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox,System.Windows.Controls.TextBox,System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox,System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel,System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the class properties relating to the schema and values into the appropriate control.
member.param: Index of the unit object in the collection of unit objects in either the numerator or denominator groups.
If true, the unit is in the numerator group.
Combo box for the schema 'type' property.
Text box for the power of the unit 'type' or 'value'.
Combo box for the schema 'value' property.
Stack panel containing the controls for setting the units schema.
Stack panel containing the controls for setting the units values.

For if there is no corresponding object to load values from. If true, the stack panels containing the corresponding controls will be collapsed. If false, the corresponding controls will remain visible but will be cleared.

member.name: M:MPT.Units.frmUnits.GetUnitsCollection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a collection of units objects based on the numerator designation.
member.param: IF true, returns the numerator units. Else, returns the denominator units.
